text:
EAST
Tennessee state college
JOHNSON CITY, TENNESSEE
DEPARTMENT OF ENGLISH, SPEECH, DRAMA
November 21, 1961
Bill Harley1s suggestion that the NAEB establish a national
audience survey office has my enthusiastic endorsement. You may
be sure that I would be happy to lend my services as consultant,
supervisor, or what have you.
I have done some of this on a free-lance basis for commer-
